mapper.select: select a.pay_id as payId, a.user_id as userId, p.product_id as productId, m.user_name as userName, a.user_tell as userTell, p.product_name as productName, p.product_url as productUrl, p.product_price as productPrice from tbl_member m, tbl_product p, tbl_pay a where m.user_id = a.user_id and p.product_id = a.product_id and a.user_id = #{userId} order by a.pay_id

select c.cart_id as cartId, c.user_id as userId, p.product_id as productId, m.user_name as userName, p.product_name as productName, p.product_url as productUrl, c.amount, p.product_price as productPrice, (product_price * amount) money from tbl_member m, tbl_product p, tbl_cart c where m.user_id = c.user_id and p.product_id = c.product_id and c.user_id = #{userId} order by c.cart_id
